name: Get Lost!
description:
Originally commissioned for Now Play This 2016. You're a suburban teen, sick of the suburbs. You run away to the land of the fairies, prepared for thrills and danger. Absolutely nothing happens the way you expect.

Please play on Philome.la, or download the appropriate .html file below.

"Get Lost!" Original/Large Version on Philome.la

"Get Lost!" Mobile/Smaller Resolution Version on Philome.la
